title: The Trial of Echoes
outcome: Neighborhood assemblies organize a public Truth Tribunal where Council, Directorate, and grassroots leaders—especially Rada—must answer for years of BCI abuse. Halden’s own archived thoughts and doubts, newly uncovered, are aired. Empathy layers Halden hid in the system are revealed, showing Halden attempted restraint, while others pushed for harsher control. Collective confessions, citywide dialogue, and direct confrontation finally clarify Halden’s intentions and the causes of his death.

events.description: Assemblies announce citywide Truth Tribunal, inviting all factions and affected citizens to testify about BCI abuses and Council failures.
AI archives release selected clips of Halden’s personal reflections, including his doubts and attempts to moderate Council excesses. Arguments erupt over his true motives.
Experts discover evidence of 'empathy layers' Halden embedded in BCI to soften enforcement; these were covertly dismantled by Directorate later on.
Live confession sessions bring revelations of mass disappearances, targeted score manipulations, and internal sabotage. Citizens demand amnesty and reforms.
Tribunal’s final decision: BCI abuses acknowledged, Directorate condemned, and Halden’s death understood as a last act of protest against growing inhumanity of the system.
